name: dice-tiles
title: Dice Tiles
description: Roll dice and eliminate numbered tiles by matching their sum. Track victories, unlock rewards, and reach higher tiers of accomplishment.
author: Minniti Julien

commands.name: index
commands.title: Dice Tiles
commands.subtitle: Tiles and Dice Challenge
commands.description: Play directly in Raycast by rolling dice and selecting tiles to match the sum.
